thread.title: Using cotton candy machines to make artificial organs
thread.title_full: Using cotton candy machines to make artificial organs

title: Using cotton candy machines to make artificial organs
text:
Using cotton candy machines to make artificial organs by Maya Dangerfield @CNNTech Researchers at Vanderbilt University are repurposing cotton candy machines to create blood capillaries -- a first step in the creation of artificial organs. Related Videos
